message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $14,000. I think you'll really love it!
Hey Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate you coming down from your initial price, but I'm looking to spend closer to $12,500. Would you be open to that?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm not quite comfortable with $12,500. I can do $13,500, which is as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
